turtle works up quickly and easily this marine amigurumi features a realistic looking turtle with curved flippers and a textured shell it is designed with super bulky chenille velvet yarn for a huggable 9-inch plush but can also be crocheted with other yarn fibers try using blanket yarn or use medium / worsted weight acrylic and cotton yarn for a smaller keychain size turtle it s the perfect birthday gift or christmas holiday gift for animal lovers and turtle enthusiasts the pdf pattern includes in-line progress photos as part of a photo tutorial to help guide you through the doll-making process **size** 9 across both ways height and width **materials** super bulky weight 6 yarn in desired colors i used hobbii toucan yarn 5mm crochet hook 24mm colored plastic safety eyes x2 stuffing
